text: Mr. Keuner was pondering one day a drawing of his wife which represented a chicken flying over a fence. —Why does your thigh have three legs? Mr. Keuner asked. - The chickens can't fly - the little artist said - so I put a third leg on it to give it a push. —I am glad to have asked him, — said Mr. Keuner. FIN
title: El señor Keuner y el dibujo de su sobrina
author: Bertolt Brecht
